page.title: 08A Timber Frame Home
page.content: My new home is going to be a bungalow. We are building it ourselves.My father is an architect and he has designed it.There is going to be a lounge,a dining room,a kitchen,a bathroom,a separate toilet,three bedrooms,a hallway and a garage.There will be quite a big back garden where we will be able to grow our own vegetables.The bungalow is a timber framed one,these make it easy for families to build their own homes and they are quite common in this part of the country.Everybody in my family is helping including my little brother who is only seven.We are building in the evenings,weekends and during any spare time we manage to get hold of. We are looking forward to living in our bungalow,hopefully in October.It will be especially satisfying having built it ourselves.
